channel.title: Npcs and Objects
channel.description:
Im having a problem with npcs and objects. 1) I need to know how to make a shop, i think the hybrid pvp source might be what im using, my friend gave me this source and i don't know exactly what it is. I know you have to spawn the npc then go to actionhandler.java and do something so if you know this can you post
2) I need to know how to make objects i placce with ::object stay after the server restarts/crashes

item.title: Npcs and Objects
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

All is resolved thanks mopar community

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs and Objects
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“tranomo, post:10, topic:444845”][quote author=tompacman link=topic=547530.msg4014593#msg4014593 date=1339519631]
Im having a problem with npcs and objects.

  1. I need to know how to make a shop, i think the hybrid pvp source might be what im using, my friend gave me this source and i don’t know exactly what it is. I know you have to spawn the npc then go to actionhandler.java and do something so if you know this can you post

  2. I need to know how to make objects i placce with ::object stay after the server restarts/crashes
    [/quote]
    there’s this book at most libraries entitled “Java for Beginners” i recommend you read it before you get involved with Java programing as it makes this all so much more understandable. To place objects and nps either find the character case and create a way to control the placement or find the character case in the placement file and edit the coordinates or placement values.[/quote]

.>
You don’t need to know java to spawn npcs and object. You only need to be able to read, be able to type, know what you want to spawn and have a tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs and Objects
item.dc:creator: @tranomo tranomo
item.description:
@tranomo wrote:

[quote=“tompacman, post:1, topic:444845”]Im having a problem with npcs and objects.

  1. I need to know how to make a shop, i think the hybrid pvp source might be what im using, my friend gave me this source and i don’t know exactly what it is. I know you have to spawn the npc then go to actionhandler.java and do something so if you know this can you post

  2. I need to know how to make objects i placce with ::object stay after the server restarts/crashes[/quote]
    there’s this book at most libraries entitled “Java for Beginners” i recommend you read it before you get involved with Java programing as it makes this all so much more understandable. To place objects and nps either find the character case and create a way to control the placement or find the character case in the placement file and edit the coordinates or placement values.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs and Objects
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

For the first one:

Use this if you want to open the shop by just clicking the npc.

And the second option click (“Trade” for shopping npcs)

Just add new case under switch(npcType) {

		[code]case NPC_ID:
			c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID); //The action
		break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs and Objects
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

for that would it matter where i put it?

lets say this:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 3092, 3496, -1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 3091, 3495, -1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 3090, 3494, -1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 3090, 3496, -1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 3095, 3498, -1, 10);

can i just put it in the middle of any of them?
would you do an example please
with object id 2213 and 0000 can be the coords

Read full topic
